channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 花旗计划在 2024 年底前成立中国投资银行部门并新聘 30 名员工 - 消息人士
item.description: Citigroup Inc is aiming to launch its wholly owned China investment banking unit as early as the end of this year and hire about 30 people for the business, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said.翻译:一位直接知情人士表示，花旗集团计划最早在今年年底推出其全资中国投资银行部门，并为该业务招聘约 30 名员工。
item.author: Selena Li

item.title: 中国“冰城”哈尔滨元旦假期游客量创历史新高
item.description: The "ice city" of Harbin, the snowy capital of northeast China's Heilongjiang province, attracted a record number of visitors over the New Year holiday, many of them drawn by the grand and intricate ice sculptures of its annual Ice and Snow Festival.翻译:中国东北黑龙江省的冰雪之都哈尔滨的“冰城”在新年假期吸引了创纪录的游客数量，其中许多人被一年一度的冰雪节宏伟而复杂的冰雕所吸引。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国习近平就“恐怖袭击”向伊朗总统表示慰问
item.description: China's President Xi Jinping sent a message of condolence to the Iranian president on Thursday for the "terrorist attack" a day earlier, Chinese state television CCTV said.翻译:中国国家电视台中央电视台称，中国国家主席习近平周四就一天前发生的“恐怖袭击”向伊朗总统致唁电。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 预计到 2024 年底，中国国际航班数量将达到新冠肺炎疫情前水平的 80%
item.description: China's aviation regulator said on Thursday it expects the number of international flights to and from the country to reach 6,000 per week by the end of this year, or about 80% of pre-COVID levels.翻译:中国航空监管机构周四表示，预计到今年年底，每周往返中国的国际航班数量将达到每周 6,000 架次，约为新冠疫情前水平的 80%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 流弹造成五人受伤 中国向缅甸提出抗议
item.description: China has protested to Myanmar over five people injured after artillery shells lobbed during battles between its ruling junta and rebel groups strayed into a small town near their border, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Thursday.翻译:外交部发言人周四表示，中国已就缅甸执政军政府与叛乱组织之间的战斗中炮弹误入边境附近一座小镇造成五人受伤一事向缅甸提出抗议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾发现更多中国气球，称其中一个气球飞越岛屿
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it had detected three more Chinese balloons flying across the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, and one of those flew over the island, the second day in a row it has reported such activity.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周三又发现三个中国气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越台湾岛，这是台湾国防部连续第二天报告此类活动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国多省警告大雾，上海数十个航班延误
item.description: Extremely heavy fog in several Chinese provinces on Thursday led to dangerously low visibility, closing highways, delaying flights out of Shanghai and prompting weather forecasters to release a string of warnings and advisories.翻译:周四，中国多个省份出现大雾，导致能见度极低，高速公路关闭，上海出发的航班延误，并促使天气预报员发布一系列警告和咨询。
item.author: Bernard Orr

item.title: 中国12月服务业活动增速为5个月来最快
item.description: China's services activity expanded at the fastest pace in five months thanks to a solid rise in new business, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday, lifting the degree of optimism in the sector to a three-month high.翻译:周四的一项私营部门调查显示，由于新业务的强劲增长，中国服务业活动以五个月来最快的速度扩张，将该行业的乐观程度提升至三个月高点。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾表示将在投票后公布对中国涉嫌干预选举的分析
item.description: Taiwan's foreign minister says it is documenting its experiences with China's alleged attempts to interfere in elections next week and will publish its analysis soon after the vote.翻译:台湾外交部长表示，正在记录其对中国据称试图干预下周选举的经历，并将在投票后不久发表分析。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在南海持续巡逻
item.description: China's military will conduct routine patrols with its naval and air forces in the South China Sea from Wednesday to Thursday, the military's Southern Theater Command said, as ongoing tensions simmer in the region over disputed territories.翻译:南部战区表示，随着该地区因争议领土问题持续紧张局势，中国军队将于周三至周四在南海进行例行巡逻。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）打破向中国供应天然气的单日纪录
item.description: Russian energy giant Gazprom said on Wednesday it set a new daily record the previous day for gas supplies to China through the Power of Siberia pipeline.翻译:俄罗斯能源巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司周三表示，前一天通过西伯利亚力量管道向中国供应天然气的日产量创下了新纪录。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国最大的珍珠奶茶制造商蜜雪和古茗申请香港首次公开募股
item.description: China's leading bubble tea makers including Mixue Bingcheng and Guming are rushing to apply for first-time share sales in Hong Kong as companies in the fast-growing sector expand aggressively amid fierce competition.翻译:随着这个快速增长行业的公司在激烈的竞争中积极扩张，包括蜜雪冰城和古茗在内的中国领先珍珠奶茶制造商正争相申请在香港首次发售股票。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾军方称与美国第二次南海联合巡逻正在进行
item.description: The Philippines and the United States began a two-day joint patrol in the South China Sea on Wednesday, the Philippine military said in a statement, a move that would likely irk China.翻译:菲律宾军方在一份声明中表示，菲律宾和美国周三开始在南海进行为期两天的联合巡逻，此举可能会激怒中国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉12月中国产电动汽车销量同比增长68.7%
item.description: U.S. automaker Tesla sold 94,139 China-made electric vehicles (EVs) in December, a 68.7% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Wednesday.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周三的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉12月份销售了94,139辆中国制造的电动汽车(EV)，同比增长68.7%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉12月中国产电动汽车销量同比增长68.7%
item.description: U.S. automaker Tesla sold 94,139 China-made electric vehicles in December, a 68.7% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Wednesday.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周三的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉12月份销售了94,139辆中国制造的电动汽车，同比增长68.7%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 摩根士丹利12月外资加速抛售中国股市
item.description: Global long-only funds offloaded China equities at the fastest pace of 2023 in December as they rushed to meet redemption requests and to diversify away from the world's second-largest economy, according to Morgan Stanley analysts.翻译:摩根士丹利分析师表示，全球多头基金在 12 月以 2023 年最快的速度抛售中国股票，因为它们急于满足赎回要求并实现多元化，远离世界第二大经济体。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 中方表示愿向日本抗震救灾提供帮助
item.description: China is willing to provide necessary help to Japan on the massive earthquake that struck the country on New Year's Day, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Wednesday.翻译:中国外交部周三表示，中方愿就元旦发生的特大地震向日方提供必要帮助。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国顶级银行收紧对规模较小银行的风险敞口以遏制信贷风险
item.description: Some of China's top banks have sharpened scrutiny of smaller peers' asset quality and have tightened standards for interbank lending, three sources said, in an effort to curb credit risk as a deepening property debt crisis ripples through the economy.翻译:三名消息人士称，中国一些顶级银行加强了对规模较小银行资产质量的审查，并收紧了银行间拆借标准，以在不断加深的房地产债务危机波及整个经济之际遏制信贷风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国基金经理急于创建追踪新A50指数的基金
item.description: Chinese money managers are rushing to create funds tracking the newly-launched CSI A50 Index, which analysts say is a better reflection of China's economic landscape and government priorities than the country's stock benchmarks.翻译:中国的基金管理公司正忙于创建追踪新推出的中证A50指数的基金，分析师表示，该指数比中国的股票基准更好地反映了中国的经济形势和政府的优先事项。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大选后中国可能对台湾采取“鹰派”军事压制
item.description: The arms race across the Taiwan Strait and Chinese military pressure against the island Beijing claims as its "sacred" territory is unlikely to end no matter who wins Taiwan's closely watched elections.翻译:无论谁赢得台湾备受关注的选举，台湾海峡的军备竞赛以及中国对北京声称其“神圣”领土的岛屿的军事压力都不太可能结束。
item.author: Yew Lun Tian, James Pomfret
